Scriptal.Name: Check GameObjectId
Scriptal.Description: Checks to see if a number matches a GameObjectId. Comparing a GameObjectId to the Event Default Argument 'arg1' is similar to checking the Sender. Note: For most events, 'arg1' represents the GameObjectId that sent the event. Other event args can contain GameIds, check Tex's notes on messages in InfLookup.lua for more details: https://github.com/TinManTex/InfiniteHeaven/blob/master/tpp/gamedir-ih/GameDir/mod/modules/InfLookup.lua
Scriptal.EventFunctionTemplate: local tempGameObjectIdVal = |[1|STRING,NUMBER]| if type(tempGameObjectIdVal) == "string" then tempGameObjectIdVal = GetGameObjectId(tempGameObjectIdVal) end return tempGameObjectIdVal == |[2|NUMBER]|

Choice.Name: Game Object
Choice.Description: The Game Object (their string name or number GameObjectId) to be compared against.

Choice.Name: Number ID
Choice.Description: The ID to compare to the GameObjectId
